segments.text: I notice the boy standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching as high as he can, trying to get those cookies without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, and that makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel his excitement as he grabs for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm also worried he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl standing next to him seems eager to get a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's looking up at him with such anticipation, like she can't wait to get her hands on one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies when the adult isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit amusing to see their teamwork, but also a bit concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
